problem.p: A physical pendulum consists of a disc of radius \(a\) and mass \(M\) fixed at the end of a rod of length \(D\) and negligible mass. The other end of the rod is pivoted about point Q as shown. Initially the bob is released from rest from a small angle \(\theta_o\) with respect to the vertical.
